title: Néron model
summary: In algebraic geometry, the Néron model (or Néron minimal model, or minimal model) for an abelian variety AK defined over the field of fractions K  of a Dedekind domain R is the "push-forward" of AK from Spec(K) to Spec(R), in other words the "best possible"  group scheme AR defined over R corresponding to AK.
